Address.Address1: NO. 118 SHA TOU CHUN, SHA JING

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Venus Royal Hotel (Formerly Kirin Parkview Hotel) in Shenzhen (Bao'an - Shenzhen International Airport), you'll be convenient to Shajing Citizen Square and Sanpin Cultural Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Quwei Botanical Garden and Yijia Shopping Mall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 410 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Venus Royal Hotel (Formerly Kirin Parkview Hotel) is Skukuza (SZK).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
